about.title: About me
about.desc1: Web designer and 3D modeling specialist with experience in digital fabrication and interactive technologies. My work focuses on creating intuitive interfaces, innovative digital experiences, and impactful visual solutions.
about.desc2: I have experience in UX/UI design, digital prototyping, and frontend development, combining tools such as Figma, Vite, Vue.js, and Bootstrap to create modern and functional web interfaces.
about.desc3: In addition, my profile is complemented by 3D modeling and digital fabrication, using software such as Blender, Rhinoceros, Onshape, and ZBrush to develop interactive products, physical prototypes, and immersive experiences.
